price: Nokorε sε, wᴐdwen sεdeε mo (nnipa no mu bi) dwen sε Nyankopͻn nsoma (ᴐsomafoͻ) biara no.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yabʿatha al-lahu aḥadan
